avg walking speed = 5 km/h

5 km/h * 1000m/km = 5000m/h
5000m/h * 100cm/m = 5,000,00cm/h
5,000,00cm/h / 60min/h = 8333.3333333333333333333333333333cm/min
8333.3333333333333333333333333333 cm/min / 60sec/min = 138.88888888888888888888888888889 cm/sec
138.88888888888888888888888888889 cm/sec / 30 frames/sec = 4.6296296296296296296296296296296 cm/frame

tile size = 64x32 pixels, 10x10 meters
pixels along tile diagonal = sqrt( 64*64 + 32*32 )
1 pixel up = 1/32ths of a tile diagonal size
tile diagonal size = sqrt( 10x10 + 10x10 ) = sqrt( 200 ) = 14.142135623730950488016887242097
1/32ths of 14.142135623730950488016887242097 = 0.44194173824159220275052772631553
1 pixel up = 0.44194173824159220275052772631553 meters
1 pixel up = 44.194173824159220275052772631553 cm

to travel 1 pixel up at walking speed would take = 
44.194173824159220275052772631553 cm / 138.88888888888888888888888888889 cm/sec =
0.31819805153394638598037996294718 sec

in 1 second, the amount of pixels travelled up is =
1 / 0.31819805153394638598037996294718 sec = 3.1426968052735445528926416093549 pixels/sec
3.1426968052735445528926416093549 pixels/sec / 30 frames/sec = 0.10475656017578481842975472031183 pixels/frame

to travel 10 meters would take =
10,00 cm / 4.6296296296296296296296296296296 cm/frame = 216 frames
216 frames / 30 frames/sec = 7.2 sec

256x256 map = 2560x2560 meters
character width = 0.5 meters
# of pathfinding cells = 10240 x 10240 = 10485760
10485760 cells * 4 bytes = 41943040 bytes = 40960 kB = 40 MB
